svg.text: From UN-Centric Systems to Integrated Planetary Stewardship
Indigenous-Led Moral Authority Traditional Knowledge Guidance
Treaty Mechanisms Under Indigenous Guidance Meta-Governance Coordination
From Colonial Fragmentation to Planetary Stewardship: The Enhanced Peace Governance Architecture
transforms nation-state competition into bioregional cooperation, replacing extractive intervention with regenerative
healing guided by Indigenous wisdom, funded through Treaty mechanisms, and coordinated across all governance domains.
Each level strengthens the others while maintaining cultural sovereignty and ecological integrity.
